name: Set Fire to the Empire!
description:
Set Fire to the Empire!

PRESS UP TO START!

(h)Armless stormtroopers are flooding the area, and lasers are shooting from all around!

Reflect the lasers, kick the harmless stormtroopers, and when your combo reaches 10 or above, release a devastating dash attack!

The higher your combo, the higher your score multiplier becomes!

Try to get the highest score you can before getting struck by lasers 3 times!
